description: SPINNING OUT OF WORLD WAR HULKS! THE SENSATIONAL SHE-HULK RETURNS! Jen Walters teams up with LYRA, the all-new SAVAGE SHE-HULK, to bring the hurt down on the fugitive members of THE INTELLIGENCIA. Klaw, Mad Thinker, Red Ghost, Trapster, and Wizard tried to take over the world and now must pay for what they've done. Guest starring THE INCREDIBLE HULK in this all-new story of She-Hulk smackdown!
name: Man Hunt, Part 1

description:
Valley of Death

There had been drought and the hills had been over-grazed by sheep and cattle... they were barren now and the famished wolves raced after Black Fury's band of mustangs! Black Fury kicked and slashed at them and kept them off while the thundering herd rocketed across the razor-back ridge... down a slope... and into a quiet, green valley where no natural enemies lay waiting to prey! There was sweet water and lush, green vegetation! Only Black Fury sensed the silent death dwelling here... in vain, he avaged his gaunted charges to make them leave! They stayed... to die!

Busted Bronc Buster

Lyle Hambril prided himself on how tough he was... he boasted that his cowhands were quicker and better than any in the basin! His horse-wrangler, old Jim Hughes, was the best until he met up with a white-eyed outlaw who really went berserk when Jim climbed into the saddle!

Adventures of a Cowboy (Text Only Story)

Left To Die

The blizzard came out of a clear Autumn sky... the first storm of the year, and it caught Whitey Gaard in a light denom jacket, worn out dungarees, and a dozen miles from home! Whitey wasn't worried at first... he was astride Maggie, a plenty smart mare, ad he knew she'd find the ranch!

Sacrifice Stallion

The warriors were wearing paint... over 1,000 Cheyenne braves were ready for war, to insure victory, they sacrificed to the gods of battle... by sending the finest horse on the plains into the pit of bones according to an ancient rite! The war chief, Hushap, had personally led the hunters on Black Fury's trail... used all his guile, and captured him by using a frightened colt for bait! Now, Hushap fired his rifle in Black Fury's ear! The stallion leaped from the rim out into space taking Amos Fyffe, U.S. Cavalryman, with him!
name: Valley of Death; Busted Bronc Buster; Adventures of a Cowboy; Left To Die; Sacrifice Stallion

description:
The Killer Brand

Stories were told about Black Fury around campfires on dark nights when the trumpeting challenge of the Black King of the prairie echoed off the rocky crags of his domain! Those who knew the facts told the truth... they spoke of his gentleness to the weak his stout heart, and blazing speed! The liars distorted the facts... they claimed that Black Fury was a vicious lethal hatr of mankind! Some had reason for their lies... like Duke Linden, the man ho billed himself as King of the Cowboys! He branded the stallion for all to see... with... The Killer Brand

Forgotten Glory

They forgot about old Sam Collev, the people of Carter's Wells did! They forgot how he'd cleaned up the town and the territory when it was swarming with gunmen and outlaws! To Sam it was forgotten glory! To the people of Carter's Wells, it was just forgotten! All they remembered was that Sam was getting old... Forgotten Glory

Minced Money (Text Only Story)

The Gentle Terror

Black Fury was well known to the renegades who rose the Black Hills, raiding, stealing, bushwhacking, and then fleeing on their half-wild mustangs before the Army or the law could get them in their gun-sights! To these warriors and outlaw white men, a fleet horse meant survival... and they made many an attempt to capture the great stallion! Black Fury wasn't too easy to conquer, they discovered... The Gentle Terror

The Palomino Mare

The Ramada was grazing on the first tender grasses of early Spring... Dirk Bentner ran a horse ranch near where they grazed... and his brutal methods had turned the stomachs of strong men! Now, he was training his most valuable animal... a fancy palomino mare! The sound of his snarling voice carried to Black Fury heard the mare's shrill scream of pain! That was enough... he charged down into man's domain and taught Dirk Bentner that all horses were not afraid of him!
name: The Killer Brand; Forgotten Glory; Minced Money; The Gentle Terror; The Palomino Mare
Drought!; A Way To Freedom; Call of the Blood; Horse Sense
Run For the Sunset!; The Victims; The First Cowboy; Mountain Man; Death At A Distance; Land Rush

description: This is it! Deathstroke versus Batman! When a mission traps our deadly team in Arkham Asylum, they're divided and confronted by some of Gotham City's most notorious villains.
name: Family Reunions, Part 2: Clear and Present Danger

description: Holmes, Watson, and LeStrade go deep undercover to find the truth behind strange tunnels, missing sandwiches in the break room, suspicious paper jams, and maybe even some larceny! But will they learn the real truth behind "The Red-Headed League"?
name: The Red-Headed League

description:
Mistrust

It was a romance without a flaw! How I looked forward to our wedding day!

Was I Jinxed?

How can one person stand so much grief? Can you blame me for feeling jinxed? Both of them were gone.. gone!

Parson's Wife

My friend, Irene, was certainly surprised when she heard that I was going to marry a preacher...

Paul's Pride (Text Only Story)

The Best Intention!

I learned that a wife can have the best intentions when she tries to please her husband but she better be careful!
name: The Parson's Wife?
Married in Haste, Lesson for Linda, Lovely Triangle
The Saga of the Fog Bank!

description: She's lain claim to Wakanda...now Perfect Storm has her sights set on Genosha! And with Little ˜Ro in her clutches, our mutant heroes are more vulnerable than ever to the wretched weather witch's wrath. But if anyone can stop the traitorous X-Man-turned-conqueror -- it's the mysterious Ghost Panther! Is this the spirit of T'Challa come back for vengeance...or something far, far worse?
name: The Gathering Storm

description:
The shocking battle for our dimension comes to a shattering conclusion; and not everyone will survive! ! Who will make the ultimate sacrifice to save us? Marvel fans will not want to miss this startling chapter in Avengers history. Plus: another chapter in the oral history of the Avengers!

As Wolverine battles Agamotto, the heroes back on Earth worry that he is not doing well. As the two fight, Daniel Drumm, Jericho's brother accidentally shows up and joins in the fight. Agamotto says the rules of the fight have been broken and blasts Wolverine and Daniel. Jericho joins the fight too and the sky outside begins to crack open again. Jericho uses all his power and the Eye to blast Agamotto, throwing Wolverine out of the battle. In a final blast, Jericho destroys Agamotto and disappears, leaving behind an angry Daniel who is furious at the Avengers that his brother is dead. Daniel briefly possesses Luke but he disappears too. Hellstrom goes outside to tell the assembled crowd in front of the building that they should be grateful for what the Avengers have done to save them.

As Doug Ramsey struggles with the hideous transformation he has undergone at the hands of the Red Skull, his once best friend, Warlock, has decided it's time to take him down! Meanwhile, Magik, Cannonball, and Sunspot work hand in hand with Selene to rally the people of Nova Roma to their cause!
name: The Fall of Nova Roma, Part 4- Living... A Nightmare!
Roving Romeo, Brains Not Beauty, No Deeper Love
Only Julie, Forgive A Failure, Patient With A Heart

description:
The Far-Off Voice of Love - 8 pages

In the Shadow of Love - 7 pages

Nobody Loves a Go-Go Girl - 8 pages
name: Nobody Loves a Go-Go Girl
